raw_mentions:
Here are the extracted sentences that meet the criteria:


Puromycin was added at a final concentration of 3 μg/ml.
The cells were diluted with HBSS to 2×10<sup>6 </sup>cells/ml, 
The mice were fed with water containing 2 g/L doxycycline, 
3 ug of the protein was taken based on the protein concentration and diluted to 35 μl with sterile water.
The medium was changed to 30 ml of CDM4HEK293, 
Protein concentration was detected with an IL12p70 ELISA kit, 
A prepared protein solution was sucked by using a 29G insulin syringe, and slowly injected into a tumor at  a volume of  35 μl and 65 μl of glycerin.
